measured_by: semantic categorization task (drag-and-drop of motive-related words into seven labelled boxes)
justification: "Subjects were then asked to drag and drop each word into one of the boxes. All box labels began with the phrase 'motivated by…' and ended with one of the following: …fear, …anger, …the desire for possession and consumption."

measured_by: continuous visual analogue scale (0-100) ratings of each word
justification: "Participants…also rated each of the 305 words on two scales: a valence scale and an arousal scale. Scales consisted of continuous scrolling bars, which could take values between 0 and 100."

measured_by: self-report ratings on motive-specific adjective items using a visual analogue scale (-350 to 350)
justification: "Participants were provided with a list of words and for each one, they were asked to rate in how far they felt 'currently driven by these motivations, feelings or states', on a continuous visual analogue scale ranging ‑350 to 350."
